mapper.select: SELECT dt.doc_type_name, df.doc_form_name, e.emp_name, df.doc_form_use, df.doc_form_upHit FROM employee e, document_type dt, doc_form df WHERE df.emp_id = e.emp_id AND dt.doc_type_idx = df.doc_type_idx AND df.doc_form_name like CONCAT('%',#{param1},'%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO doc_form(emp_id, doc_type_idx, doc_form_content, doc_form_name) VALUES('20180001',#{doc_type_idx},#{doc_form_content},#{doc_form_name})
